Text:
From Answers.com:

"This is most of the Sex Pistols' performance at Burton on Trent on September 24, 1976, recorded off the soundboard and therefore in generally good (but not excellent) sound. (Two of the 13 songs are missing.) This was shortly before the group signed its first record contract, and it's easy to hear what attracted attention to them."

http://www.answers.com/topic/the-original-pistols-live
